name: Mike is finding!
description:
Mike is Finding!

Authors:

  • João Antunes
  • Rodrigo Fialho
  • Tiago Brites

This game is an exploration game where you will play a hide and seek with your friends.

What is it about?

Mike is a character who is having a birthday party, and will play a game of hide and seek with friends, where the main objective is to find everyone hiding across the map

Controls (Keyboard):

Movement: 

  • Arrow Up
  • Arrow Down
  • Arrow Left 
  • Arrow Right

Interact: 

  • Z
